alert.note: Alert for Alger; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL MARQUETTE AND SOUTHWESTERN ALGER COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Deerton, or 17 miles southeast of Marquette, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Munising, Au Train, Chatham, K. I. Sawyer Airport, Skandia, Laughing Whitefish Falls, Christmas, Forest Lake, Sundell, Kiva, Wetmore, Eben Junction, Carlshend, and Traunik. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
